g.text: (e) State the domain and range of
Find the domain of the function.
How are graphs of the functions obtained from the graph of
Without using a calculator, make a rough sketch of the graph.
ANSWERS TO DIAGNOSTIC TEST C: FUNCTIONS
Stretch vertically by a factor of 2, then shift 1 unit
(c) Shift 3 units to the right and 2 units upward
